Carrying Capacity
(Average Human): (10xStrength + 10) to (20xStrength + 10)
     Burdened (No Mbl): 40-80
      Over Burdened (Must Lift): 80-120
Human Weight
     Skinny: 80
     Normal: 100
     Chubby: 120
Carriers
     Satchel: 30 Max
     Hiker Backpack: 70 Max
Items
     0: Piece of Paper
     1: Gold Coin, Key, Paper, Food, Water
     3: Book, Cup, Spyglass
     5: Dagger, Bed Roll, Most Bundled Clothes
     7: Pistol, Quiver, Pan/Pot
     10: Sword, Grappling Hooking, Spool of Rope,
     12: Shovel, Pickaxe, Wood Shield
     15: Bed Roll, Spear
     20: Gallon of water
Clothes/Worn
     0: Most Clothes, Sheath (Empty)
     5: Parka, Leather Jerkin, Metal Gauntlet
     10: Chainmail Vest
     20: Steel Breastplate
     50: Full Armor Suit
          Breastplate 20
          2 Gauntlets 5x2
          Grieves 10
          Helmet 10
Damage Types
      Bash - Blunt weapons applies knockdown, Stun, Disarm, Shatter
      Slash - Sharp weapons applies Bleeding, Pin, Poison, or Severed.
      Pierce - Applies Pin, Poison
      Fire/Ice/Darkness - Applies Flame, Iced, etc, Destroyed
      Origins - Arcane/ Divine/Demonic
      Push - Does no Damage Success move target.
Damage Conditionals
      Head / - Extra Damge its hit.
      On Critical - Do extra effect if you bring a character to a damage area. eg on crital sever
Price
      1G - Bread, Ale, Matches, Hay, Bucket
      3G - Tent, Waterskin, wallet, Quiver, Rope, General Tools
      5G - Drugs, Specialized tools, Knife, Clothes, Club, Bag
      10G - Wine, Saddle
      15G - Potion, Typical Weapon, Leather Armor Piece
      20G - Magic Scroll, Chain Armor Piece
